table.name: ob_ship_unit_content
table.description: This table links to the OB_SHIP_UNIT to identify and define the contents of the box, package or pallet. For e.g., the shipment unit may be a 100 lb. Pallet and the contents may be ## Nike shoes.

columns.name: OB_SHIP_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The GID for the ship unit associated with the order base.

columns.name: SEQUENCE_NO
columns.description: The unique sequence within the ship unit to define the individual line items.

columns.name: PACKAGED_ITEM_GID
columns.description: The packaged item GID defining the content line for the ship unit.

columns.name: INITIAL_ITEM_GID
columns.description: The initial packaged item GID, this value can be used to handle the original packaged item order and the substituted and item to be processed in the packaged item GID field.

columns.name: TAG1
columns.description: Additional information about the item. Like the color, size, code.

columns.name: TAG2
columns.description: Additional information about the item. Like the color, size, code.

columns.name: TAG3
columns.description: Additional information about the item. Like the color, size, code.

columns.name: TAG4
columns.description: Additional information about the item. Like the color, size, code.

columns.name: WEIGHT
columns.description: The gross weight of the item.

columns.name: WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for gross weight column.

columns.name: WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The gross weight in base units.

columns.name: VOLUME
columns.description: The gross volume of the item.

columns.name: VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for the gross volume.

columns.name: VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The gross volume in base units.

columns.name: DECLARED_VALUE
columns.description: The declared value, commercial value of the ship unit line contents for sale of goods.

columns.name: DECLARED_VALUE_BASE
columns.description: The declared value in the base currency.

columns.name: DECLARED_VALUE_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The declared value currency identifier.

columns.name: PACKAGED_COUNT
columns.description: The number of packages in this order release ship unit line for one ship unit. Its ship unit may represent more than one same ship units. E.g., for 20 ship units that contains 4 cases of 24 cans of cocoa, each order release ship unit line row will have an item GID: cocoa, item count 4x24, item package specification: case-of-24-cans, item package count: 4. The ship unit count will be 20.

columns.name: WEIGHT_PER_SHIP_UNIT
columns.description: The weight per ship unit order base content line to handle shipping a multiple count number of ship units.

columns.name: WEIGHT_PER_SHIP_UNIT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The weight per ship unit unit of measure.

columns.name: WEIGHT_PER_SHIP_UNIT_BASE
columns.description: The weight per ship unit in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: COUNT_PER_SHIP_UNIT
columns.description: The packaged item count per ship unit order base content line count to handle shipping a multiple count number of ship units.

columns.name: VOLUME_PER_SHIP_UNIT
columns.description: The volume per order base content line to handle shipping a multiple count number of ship units.

columns.name: VOLUME_PER_SHIP_UNIT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The volume per ship unit unit of measure.

columns.name: VOLUME_PER_SHIP_UNIT_BASE
columns.description: The volume per ship unit in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: PACKAGING_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The packaging unit identifier for any inner packaging associated to the ship unit such as carton configuration.

columns.name: PACKAGING_UNIT_COUNT
columns.description: The packaging unit count for the inner pack.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
